text: Zviad Gamsakhurdia (, tr. Zviad K'onst'ant'ines dze Gamsakhurdia; , tr. Zviad Konstantinovich Gamsakhurdiya; March 31, 1939 â€” December 31, 1993) was a Georgian scientist and writer. He became the first democratically elected President of Georgia in the post-Soviet era.
